name: Maldatabase
description: A REST API providing malware datasets and threat intelligence feeds for researchers and companies, supporting big data visualization and machine learning

about.overview: Maldatabase API delivers comprehensive malware datasets and threat intelligence feeds in CSV or JSON formats, including details like SHA256, file types, and threat levels, designed for data science, threat analysis, and machine learning applications.
features: Detailed malware datasets with SHA256, MD5, and SHA1 hashes
Threat intelligence feeds with domains and processes
Support for CSV and JSON output formats
Premium services for customized data delivery
useCases: Building machine learning models for malware detection
Integrating with cybersecurity tools for real-time analysis

endpoints.description: Download the latest daily malware feed in CSV or JSON format

codeSnippets.curl: curl -X POST https://api.maldatabase.com/download -H 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY' -H 'Accept-Encoding: gzip'

quickStart: Contact info@maldatabase.com to request API access
Obtain an API key upon approval
Make a POST request to https://api.maldatabase.com/download to download the daily malware feed

authentication.description: Include your API key in the Authorization header as 'Bearer YOUR_API_KEY' for all requests. Content is gzip encoded.
